attributes.action: charge drivers from fellow EU member states a toll similar to those imposed by other european countries currently.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a frequent driver within the EU I have frequently paid significant sums to drive within their country, which seems fair and just as a foreigner on their shores and using their resources.  This said why is it we do not ask drivers on our shores to pay toward the upkeep of our roads as they eneter at our border, just as they do in Switzerland (45 euros = 45 pounds currently).  Surely this too is only fair and just.
